name: Haxorus
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: Its tusks are incredibly destructive. They can easily slice through a thick, sturdy steel column every time.

attacks.name: Dragonaxe
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage times the amount of {M} Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Strike of the Champion
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is a Team Plasma Pokémon, it is Knocked Out. (If the Defending Pokémon is not a Team Plasma Pokémon, this attack does nothing.)
